content: making loops until you run out of orange yarn repeat process with red yarn when finished secure yarn by tying a separate piece of red yarn around orange and red loops cut in the center of loops rough up yarn with a brush if desired you re finished you can now throw f-bombs around even when you must remain silent please follow me facebook brittwadsworthcc instagram bwcrochetedcreations ravelry bwcrochetedcreate *pattern is for private use only pattern may not be duplicated and sold bombs made using this pattern may be sold but please credit me brittany wadsworth crocheted creations
